alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:23PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA AND SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM CDT... At 923 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gunn, or near Grand Rapids, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warba around 935 PM CDT. Swan River around 940 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Blackberry, Hart Lake, Floodwood Lake, Wawina, Goodland, La Prairie and Bovey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
